synopsis.text: Whether it's a single mother overwhelmed with the challenges of parenting, a high school student grappling with the harsh realities of bullying, or an office worker struggling with mundane workplace issues, there's one enigmatic feline who's always ready to lend a comforting paw. Heizou Endou, a cat with an extraordinary ability to detect the scent of human tears, roams the city streets under the cover of darkness, seeking out those in distress. Along with his trusty companion, Juurou, Heizou offers solace and advice to those in need, making a positive impact on their lives. This heartwarming anime follows the touching encounters between Heizou and the people he helps, proving that sometimes, all it takes to turn things around is a little bit of compassion and understanding.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
